channel.title: Keep it simple
channel.description:
I'm doing a worksheet and I don't have my thinking cap on.
[b]Directions: Change each inflated word or expression on the left to something simpler. Give 2 examples.[/b]
At this point in time _________
At your earliest convenience _________
Despite the fact that _________
In the event that _________
In the majority of cases _________
Prior to that time _________
The necessity is eliminated _________
Subsequent to _________
Thanks ;D

item.title: Keep it simple
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

I said let it die, read.

Read full topic

item.title: Keep it simple
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

At this point in time - right now

At your earliest convenience - as soon as possible.

Despite the fact that - ignoring that

In the event that _________

In the majority of cases _________

Prior to that time - before that

The necessity is eliminated _________

Subsequent to _________

I’m an idiot haha.

Read full topic

item.title: Keep it simple

item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

At this point in time _________Currently

At your earliest convenience _________?

Despite the fact that _________Regard to

In the event that _________?

In the majority of cases _________Mostly

Prior to that time _________Then

The necessity is eliminated _________?

Subsequent to _________Gay

item.title: Keep it simple
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

At this point in time - Presently

At your earliest convenience - ASAP?

Is it supposed to be single words, or phrases using much more simple words?

item.title: Keep it simple
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

At this point in time _Now

At your earliest convenience _Now

Despite the fact that _I dont fucking care

In the event that _When I give a shit

In the majority of cases _Mainly

Prior to that time _Before

The necessity is eliminated _I quit

Subsequent to _Your better
